item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (749 points | 406 comments)
2. Two new PebbleOS watches (610 points | 247 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (145 points | 51 comments)
4. HTTrack Website Copier (67 points | 8 comments)
5. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (188 points | 121 comments)
6. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (290 points | 494 comments)
7. FTC Removes Posts Critical of Amazon, Microsoft, and AI Companies (142 points | 21 comments)
8. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (199 points | 62 comments)
9. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (67 points | 22 comments)
10. Designing Electronics That Work (44 points | 14 comments)
11. Verification-First Development (19 points | 1 comment)
12. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
13. The race is on to build the most complex machine (42 points | 16 comments)
14. PeerTube v7.1 Is Out (31 points | 2 comments)
15. Fedora 42 Beta (96 points | 44 comments)
16. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (108 points | 27 comments)
17. Nvidia's RTX Pro 6000 has 96GB of VRAM and 600W of power (19 points | 15 comments)
18. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (139 points | 56 comments)
19. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (118 points | 17 comments)
20. This is no world for an axolotl (32 points | 9 comments)
21. Practical Process Control: Methods and Best Practices for Automatic PID Control (12 points | discuss)
22. 20 Years of YC / HN (50 points | 17 comments)
23. Learning to Love Dandelions (2021) (5 points | 1 comment)
24. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (110 points | 42 comments)
25. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (225 points | 75 comments)
26. Building Agentic Flows with LangGraph and Model Context Protocol (6 points | discuss)
27. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (595 points | 366 comments)
28. Volkswagen's cheapest EV ever is the first to use Rivian software (42 points | 39 comments)
29. Ask HN: How Do I Escape Homelessness After Rebuilding My Mental Health? (59 points | 35 comments)
30. Show HN: I converted my notebook into a searchable database of IT keywords (42 points | 19 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
